quote.#text: A bill to take certain Federal lands located in El Dorado County, California, into trust for the benefit of the Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians, and for other purposes.

official-title-amendment.#text: Amend the title so as to read:

official-title.#text: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to take certain Federal lands located in El Dorado County, California, into trust for the benefit of the Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians, and for other purposes.

action-desc.#text: Reported with amendments, committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union, and ordered to be printed

header.#text: Land into Trust for the Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is hereby taken into trust for the benefit of the Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians, subject to valid existing rights and management agreements related to easements and rights-of-way.
